speed_champion.name: Speed Champion
speed_champion.description: A hot rod with a race champion driver.

modified_car.name: Modified Car
modified_car.description: A souped up sedan car with some extra performance.

muscle_car.name: Muscle Car
muscle_car.description: A muscle car with speed and extra armor.

sport_car.name: Sport Car
sport_car.description: An extra agile sport car with some extra speed.

concert_truck.name: Concert Truck
concert_truck.description: A truck equipped with speakers and sometimes a live musician to inspire the other cars.

extra_juice.name: Juice Up
extra_juice.flavor: Some extra juice to get the advantage.
extra_juice.description: Use when a unit moves. It may move an additional 3".

expert_drivers.name: Expert Drivers
expert_drivers.description: Use when taking an Initiative test. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
expert_drivers.flavor: With countless hours of driving experience, these drivers can react to the most dangerous situations.

focused.name: Focused
focused.description: Use when a unit is in a collision. That unit does not gain any Shock for the collision.
focused.flavor: Safely colliding with other vehicles or objects is a skill in and of itself.
